content.text: “空”函数。A no-operation function that returns an empty string. Commonly used as a default callback or placeholder function to avoid null/undefined function calls.

text.comment:
Function:

NOOP

Description:

“空”函数。A no-operation function that returns an empty string. Commonly used as a default callback or placeholder function to avoid null/undefined function calls.

Returns:

Always returns an empty string

Example:
// Using as default callback
function processData(data, callback = NOOP) {
  // Process data...
  callback(); // Safe to call even if no callback provided
}
Example:
// Using in animation options
const animationOptions = {
  duration: 1000,
  onProcess: NOOP, // Default no-op if no process handler needed
  onFinish: () => console.log('Done')
};
Since:

1.0.0
